definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)

sentences.english: They all wore the most expensive clothes and had beautiful, long, curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 她們都穿着最昂貴的衣服，留着長長的美麗的鬈髮。

sentences.english: Her corn-coloured ringlets hung gaily about her face.
sentences.chinese: 她的玉米色的鬈髮嫵媚地掛在她的臉上。

sentences.english: Until I was eleven or twelve, she had long dark wavy hair.
sentences.chinese: 我十一二歲前，母親總是留着長長的鬈髮。

sentences.english: Can power curly hair, thin face, very suitable, you can be very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 可以電鬈髮，瘦的臉，十分適宜，可以顯得很漂亮。

sentences.english: He was a strongly made man with dark curling hair, from forty-five to fifty years of ae.
sentences.chinese: 這人身體結實，深色鬈髮，年紀在四十五至五十。

sentences.english: The poodle yapped and snap ped.
sentences.chinese: 那隻鬈毛狗又是叫又是咬。

sentences.english: Her hair was styled into a cascade of spiral curls.
sentences.chinese: 她的頭髮被做成了瀑布般的螺旋形鬈髮。

sentences.english: Ms. Frizzle's class is growing a beautiful garden.
sentences.chinese: 女士鬈髮的階級日益一個美麗的花園。

sentences.english: His head was crowned with a mop of brown curls.
sentences.chinese: 他長了一頭蓬亂的棕色鬈髮。

sentences.english: She shook her dark curls sadly.
sentences.chinese: 她悲痛地搖動她的黑色鬈髮。

sentences.english: Their hair grew long and ragged, in whirls of curls or in knots and tangles.
sentences.chinese: 頭髮長而亂，鬈曲打結，纏成一團。

sentences.english: Her hair was caught all to one side in a great bloom of frizz.
sentences.chinese: 她將全部頭髮梳向一邊成大發鬈，像花一般。

sentences.english: The child's hair grew in pretty waves.
sentences.chinese: 那個孩子長著的鬈髮很好看。

sentences.english: I dreamed of a chestnut steed tossing its glossy mane in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 我夢見棕色的駿馬，發亮的鬈毛在風中飛揚。

sentences.english: He was a strongly made man with dark curling hair, from forty-five to fifty years of age.
sentences.chinese: 這人身體結實，深色鬈髮，年紀在四十五至五十。

sentences.english: Fresh curls spring from the baldest brow.
sentences.chinese: 從那最光禿的額頭上冒出了新的鬈髮。

definition: (literary) hair hanging down in front (children's hairstyle)
hair rolled up in a bun, topknot
a knot of hair on top of head
variant of 鬢角|鬓角[bin4 jiao3]
careless, negligent, slipshod/see 邋遢[la1 ta5]
